description: This Python script defines a workflow for generating and QA'ing HTML5 games based on user prompts. It includes class definitions for game output and QA output, and a main execution block that runs the workflow and displays the generated game.

classes.name: GameOutput
classes.description: Data model for the generated game's reasoning, HTML code, and instructions.

classes.name: QAOutput
classes.description: Data model for the QA evaluation of the game code, including reasoning and correctness.

classes.name: GameGenerator
classes.description: Workflow class responsible for generating and QA'ing HTML5 games based on user prompts.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the game generation and QA process, yielding responses and handling errors.
